entry.value: select * from lakehouse.source.etl_job_stg WHERE src_table IN ('DM_PHONGBAN','DM_LOAIAN')
select NVL(max(ora_rowscn),0) src_scn from ${src_schema}.${src_table} a where ora_rowscn > ${max_scn}
select a.*, ora_rowscn src_scn from ${src_schema}.${src_table} a where ora_rowscn > ${max_scn} and ora_rowscn <= ${new_max_src_scn}
update LakeHouse.source.etl_job_stg set max_scn= ${new_max_src_scn} where src_table = '${src_table}' and src_schema= '${src_schema}'
